name: Santa's Race
description:
Merry Christmas! ❄This is my Secret Santa Game :D
Have fun playing!!

It's this time of the year again. Bringing presents to all the gamejammers :)
You and the other Santas hold a race on who can distribute their presents to the children the fastest! Can you do it and get the Golden Santa prize?! 👀

How to play:
Race around the map while giving out all your presents (dropoff = green rings)! But be quicker than all the other santas :)

Controls:
WASD - Turn & Move
Space - Slide/Drift

Disclaimer: I sadly hadn't time in the end to add sound effects. Please feel free to play some wintery music in the background while playing the game :)

Fun facts:
- The final build was build number #8 due to an bug of webgl that needed fixing
- Originally you had to pickup presents at the goal line and whoever dropped of most in time would've won the game
- This was my first proper 3d Game :D
- The names of the other santas are from an online name generator

You can check out my other games here.
Also: consider joining my Discord Server SilverRaven Games! :)
